newsitem.title: NETHERLANDS: European feeds remain subdued in afternoon - May 15.
newsitem.headline: European feeds remain subdued in afternoon - May 15.

text.p: Business on the European meals and feeds market remained slow this afternoon with only four nearby trades reported, market sources said.
Buying interest was scarce today despite easier seller prices for most products.

"There is little faith in the market due to the volatile Chicago soycomplex futures over the recent days. Many operators have the feeling that whatever they do they do it wrong and stick to covering immediate needs," one broker said.
Afloat cornglutenfeed pellets traded at $120 a tonne cif Rotterdam.
